name: Authorization for issuance of bonds
text: §48-5  Authorization for issuance of bonds.  A political subdivision which holds a certificate of convenience and necessity issued and in force pursuant to this chapter may issue local government general obligation or revenue bonds, subject to the limitations and procedures of this chapter, of the constitution of the State, of the applicable provisions of chapters 47 and 49, and of other applicable laws. [L 1964, c 58, pt of §2; Supp, §140A-6; HRS §48-5]
